entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
